title: Is He A Stalker Or A Smooth Talker
itunes:title: Is He A Stalker Or A Smooth Talker
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 38 year old married woman and we had what you’d call a whirlwind romance. We met and fell in love within 3 months and were married after only 9 months. All of my family and friends that met him, said he was the one for me and I should marry him right away. He knows how to treat a woman and he’s the best lover I’ve ever had....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
